txt.en: Borhador can be found in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Borhador.
Garvir, the leader of the Dor-en-Ernil's Gondorian forces can be found in the city of Linhir.\n\nYou should seek out Garvir in Linhir.

'You are a brave warrior and kind hearted for helping the Vale. Arvaethor suggests you head south to Dor-en-Ernil? I believe you will be of great aid to these people of eastern Belfalas. You should speak with Borhador as he is more familiar with which Gondorian captains reside in Dor-en-Ernil.'

'You head to Dor-en-Ernil to take on the corsair forces? The sons of Comeldir have been stationed in Linhir I believe. Erchar, Herion, and Garvir are their names. I can not remember which one is leading the forces there. It might be Garvir? Oh, my mind has difficulty with names and faces at my age.\n\n'No matter, travel south-east to Linhir. It is a large city that spans across the river Gilrain which runs the border between Dor-en-Ernil and Lebennin. Safe travels.'
'You are not a soldier under my command, but I welcome any warriors. You have come at a time when I need good men the most. Will you join my ranks and defend Linhir?'
Now that the enemy forces in Ringló Vale have lost their leader and had their ranks decimated, your focus has been directed to Dor-en-Ernil where corsairs have already come ashore.

'I thank you again for all that you have done for the people in Ringló Vale. There is great conflict to the south in Dor-en-Ernil. Corsairs have come ashore and push ever further inland.\n\n'Farewell my friend and may Gondor benefit from your aid.'
Laerind can be found in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Laerind.
